channel.title: Seight Custom Cycling Wear: New Products - Breeze
channel.description: A list of the new products at Seight Custom Cycling Wear.

item.title: Breeze Elite Long Sleeve Jersey
item.description:
Nothing provides you with protection and comfort when you are out for a ride like the Seight Elite Long Sleeve Jersey. Its wide surface area removes moisture from your body quickly to protect your skin against bacterial infections and odour. The high tech fibre f..

Price: $102.73

item.title: Breeze Standard Short Sleeve Jersey
item.description:
Are you looking for a comfy, reliable, and superior quality jersey at an economical price? Then the Seight Short Sleeve Jersey is what you need. Made from pure polyester, and designed with specially engineered quick drying micro fibre, it's your optimum solution when it comes to wicking mo..

Price: $71.82
